vote.title: Authorize the second step of acquisition for condemnation by eminent domain to acquire a tract of land containing approximately 342,106 square feet, from Jeffrey Ray Bishop and Mark Flanery, located on Rector Street near its intersection with East Kiest Boulevard for the Dallas Floodway Extension Project - Not to exceed $4,142,004.00 ($4,120,004.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $22,000.00) - Financing: Flood Protection and Storm Drainage Facilities Fund (2006 General Obligation Bond Funds) ($22,000.00) and Trinity River Corridor Project Fund (1998 General Obligation Bond Fund) ($4,120,004.00)
